name: Engines
headline: Tools, context and sandboxes for AI SWEs
description: Engines is the best platform for AI software engineering agents. AI SWEs will become a fundamental part of every engineering organization. We are building the foundational building blocks to make that a reality.

founders.name: Josh Valdez, Founder
founders.description: Josh is the co-founder and CEO of Engines. Prior to Engines, he was an engineering manager and early engineer at Gem (S17). Before Gem he was an infrastructure engineer at Uber on the ML Platform and Reliability teams. He holds a BS in Computer Science from Stanford.

founders.name: Jet Zhou, Founder
founders.description: Jet is the co-founder and CTO of Engines. He was the 2nd engineer at Gem (S17) responsible building and scaling all aspects of the product. Prior to Gem, he was an early engineer at ClassDojo (IK12) and worked on the Search Engine Marketing team at Amazon. He holds a BS and a MEng in Computer Science from MIT.

generated_description:
### Overview of Engines

Engines is a fresh entrant into the tech landscape, having been founded in 2023 and being part of the Y Combinator Batch W24. Positioned in the heart of San Francisco, the company is made up of a lean team of just two. Their vision revolves around equipping AI software engineers (AI SWEs) with the essential tools, context, and sandboxes they need to excel in their roles. 

### Mission and Vision

At its core, Engines is on a mission to facilitate the integration of AI SWEs into every engineering organization. They firmly believe that these AI-driven engineers will become fundamental assets for teams across the board. To that end, they are constructing foundational building blocks that will pave the way for this vision—a future where AI SWEs seamlessly enhance productivity and efficiency in software development.

### What They're Building

Engines is focused on developing a robust infrastructure for AI SWEs, including features like sandboxes, code navigation tools, and evaluation systems. These tools are designed to create an optimal environment for AI SWEs to operate in and collaborate effectively within engineering teams. Their recent publication, titled "You're Sleeping on AI SWEs," hints at the potential and urgency for embracing this new role in the tech ecosystem. 

### Tags and Connections

The company is tagged with keywords such as artificial intelligence, developer tools, devops, and infrastructure—highlighting its focus areas within the tech sphere. Harj Taggar serves as their Group Partner, adding valuable mentorship to their journey.

### Key Links

For more information, you can check out their official website at [engines.dev](https://engines.dev).

### The Bottom Line

Engines is poised at an exciting intersection of AI and software engineering, striving to create tools that will redefine how we understand and implement software development in an AI-enhanced world. They’re small but ambitious, and they believe that we are just beginning to scratch the surface of what AI SWEs can achieve. If you want to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving tech landscape, understanding and adapting to this new paradigm might just be your next move.
